com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class ListContainersOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.BlobServiceOptions
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.ListContainersOptions

  • public class ListContainersOptions
extends BlobServiceOptions
    Represents the options that may be set on a listContainers request. These options include a server response timeout for the request, a container name prefix filter, a marker for continuing requests, the maximum number of results to return in a request, and whether to include container metadata in the results. Options that are not set will not be passed to the server with a request.

      • setPrefix

        public ListContainersOptions setPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the optional container name prefix filter value to use in a request. If this value is set, the server will return only container names that match the prefix value in the response.

        The prefix value only affects calls made on methods where this ListContainersOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        prefix - A String containing the container name prefix value to use to filter the request results.
        Returns:
        A reference to this ListContainersOptions instance.

      • getMarker

        public java.lang.String getMarker()
        Gets the marker value set in this ListContainersOptions instance.
        Returns:
        A String containing the marker value to use to specify the beginning of the request results.

      • setMarker

        public ListContainersOptions setMarker(java.lang.String marker)
        Sets the optional marker value to use in a request. If this value is set, the server will return container names beginning at the specified marker in the response.

        The List Containers operation returns a marker value in a NextMarker element if the container list returned is not complete. The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of container list items. The marker value is opaque to the client.

        Use the getNextMarker method on a ListContainersResult instance to get the marker value to set on a ListContainersOptions instance using a call to this method. Pass the ListContainersOptions instance as a parameter to a BlobContract.listContainers(ListContainersOptions) call to get the next portion of the container list.

        The marker value only affects calls made on methods where this ListContainersOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        marker - A String containing the marker value to use to specify the beginning of the request results.
        Returns:
        A reference to this ListContainersOptions instance.

      • getMaxResults

        public int getMaxResults()
        Gets the value of the maximum number of results to return set in this ListContainersOptions instance.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of results to return.

      • setMaxResults

        public ListContainersOptions setMaxResults(int maxResults)
        Sets the optional maximum number of results to return for a request. If this value is set, the server will return up to this number of results in the response. If a value is not specified, or a value greater than 5,000 is specified, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

        If there are more containers than this value that can be returned, the server returns a marker value in a NextMarker element in the response. The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of container list items. The marker value is opaque to the client.

        Use the getNextMarker method on a ListContainersResult instance to get the marker value to set on a ListContainersOptions instance using a call to setMarker(String). Pass the ListContainersOptions instance as a parameter to a BlobContract.listContainers(ListContainersOptions) call to get the next portion of the container list.

        The maxResults value only affects calls made on methods where this ListContainersOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        maxResults - The maximum number of results to return.
        Returns:
        A reference to this ListContainersOptions instance.

      • isIncludeMetadata

        public boolean isIncludeMetadata()
        Gets the value of a flag set in this ListContainersOptions instance indicating whether to include container metadata in the response to the request.
        Returns:
        true to include container metadata in the response to the request.

      • setIncludeMetadata

        public ListContainersOptions setIncludeMetadata(boolean includeMetadata)
        Sets the value of an optional flag indicating whether to include container metadata with the response to the request.

        The includeMetadata value only affects calls made on methods where this ListContainersOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        includeMetadata - Set to true to include container metadata in the response to the request.
        Returns:
        A reference to this ListContainersOptions instance.
